name: Clan Survivor
description:
[Game Introduction]
Assemble your ultimate formation and test your skills in numerous combats.
Battle against legendary BOSS and become a newborn hero of the epic story.

[Game Features]
• Outstanding Storyline
Immerse yourself into the epic story and explore the vast world along your favorite characters.
• Open-fielded PVP battles
Prepare yourself for the battle between players in the open area, eliminate others to claim your victory.
• Intense Guild war
Cooperate with your guild members and form the unbeatable defense lineup with strategy to overrule other players in the Guild War.
• Tactical formation
Strike your enemy with your most deadly formation. Create the indestructible line-up with tactics and become the ruler of all.
• Fearsome bosses
Unite the whole world as one and face the fearsome world BOSS together. Defeat insidious thieves and claim your prize.
• Unique and innovative play-mode
Fruit picking, fishing and other more enjoyable in-game content that will give you a whole new gaming experience.
• Heaven’s Arena
Defeat powerful enemies in the Arena and become the top of the world. Clear hundreds of floor to prove yourself.
developers: Shijiazhuang Shitong Haina Network Technology Co
publishers: Shijiazhuang Shitong Haina Network Technology Co
